description:
The MYD11C1.005 dataset was decommissioned as of April 9, 2018. 

The MODIS/Aqua LST/E L3 Global CMG (Short name: MYD11C1) products incorporate 0.05 degree (5600 meters at the equator) pixels, which are derived from the MOD11B1 daily global 6 km grid product, and stored in a 0.05 degree geographic CMG. They are produced daily using the day/night LST algorithm, which extracts average temperatures (in Kelvin) and applies them to a pair of MODIS daytime and nighttime observations. This method yields 1 K accuracy for materials with known emissivities. The six thermal Band emissivities are retrieved through the day/night algorithm. Prior to reprojecting the MYD11C1, cloud-contaminated LSTs (daytime and nighttime) are removed by a double-screening method. Further details are available in Wan et al. (2002).

The MYD11C1 product comprises the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers for daytime and nighttime observations: LSTs, quality control assessments, observation times, view zenith angles, clear sky coverages, and emissivities for Bands 20, 22, 23, 29, 31, and 32.

The V5 Aqua/MODIS LST/E products, including MYD11C1, are validated to Stage-2 through field campaigns and radiance-based validation studies. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products are available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MYD11

Wan, ZM, Zhang, YL, Zhang, QC, Li, ZL (2002). Validation of the land-surface temperature products retrieved from Terra Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer data. REMOTE SENSING OF ENVIRONMENT, 83(2-Jan), 163-180.

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications.

The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.  Please refer to the LP DAAC MODIS product table at https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/products/modis_products_table/myd11c1  for additional detailed product version information.

V005 Data Set Characteristics: 
Area: Global 
Image Dimensions: 3600 x 7200 rows/columns 
File Size: ~50 MB compressed
Resolution: 0.05 degrees (~5.6 km at the Equator) 
Projection: Latitude/Longitude Grid 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 16
Temporal Range: 2002-07-08 to 2017-03-31
title: MODIS/Aqua Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Daily L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V005

usgs.title: Direct Download [1]
usgs.description: USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.
